title: Resource URIs

quizContent.question: Let's say you need to build RESTful URIs for various resources in an online shopping site. Say you have Category as an entity that represents all the product categories on the site. What would be a RESTful URI to lookup a category with ID categoryId?
The site also has a Product entity. This has been designed to be a first level entity like Category. What would be a good RESTful URI for a product with ID 25?
If the Product entity were to have been designed as a sub-resource under the Category entity, what would the URI for Product be?
